title: Meditation - 30 min
description: Exploration of the intimate connection of the mind and body. You will leave this class feeling relaxed and content.

title: Visit museum gallery - 30 min
description: Your local Dallas Modern Art museum is hosting an exhibit on Matisse! Go check it out and learn about his mastery of the language of color.

title: Kundalini Yoga - 45 min
description: Use ancient breathing techniques to achieve complete relaxation

title: Cooking Class
description: An introduction to the savory cuisine of the Mediterranean!

title: Painting/Sculpture Class
description: Exploration of the min

title: Interval Running - 10 minutes
description: Short, intense runs followed by equal or slightly longer recovery runs.

title: Bowling Meetup - 90 minutes
description: A series of sports or leisure activities in which a player rolls or throws a bowling ball towards a target

title: Ballroom Dancing Class - 60 minutes
description: A set of partner dances, which are enjoyed both socially and competitively around the world

title: Community Gardening - 90 minutes
description: Builds community by increasing and enhancing community gardening and greening across the community

title: Acroyoga Class - 45 minutes
description: A physical practice which combines yoga and acrobatics

title: Water polo at local club - 1.5 hours
description: At the local community swimming pool, playing pick-up water polo

title: Power yoga - 1 hour
description: An intensive yoga class focused on holding poses to build strength in the core

title: Pilates reformer - 1 hour
description: Pilates on the reformer to exercise muscles that are hard to strengthen and lengthen on the mat

title: Barre burn - 1 hour
description: Exercises are drawn from Ballet to strengthen the core muscles and to re-align and re-balance the body anatomy and muscles

title: City hiking meetup - 1 hour
description: Joining the local meetup for a hiking path

title: Mixed martial arts - 2 hours
description: A standard Mixed Martial Arts class combining drills and then sparring in striking and grappling

title: Soul cycle - 1.5 hours
description: Rhythmic cycling that makes it a dynamic and challenging workout

title: Local Nike running group - 1 hour
description: Meet at the Nike store to join the running group that jogs around the city

title: Kickboxing - 1 hour
description: A high octane workout that involves drilling and sparring

description: Join the local rowing club for an intense workout on the river
